name: byutv-jsonp
description: The `byutv-jsonp` element (`<byutv-jsonp>`) exposes network request functionality.  It is a Polymer v1.0+ element that facilitates making JSONP requests.  It uses Polymer behaviors (`Byutv.behaviors.Jsonp`).  It is patterned after Polymer's `iron-ajax` element (`<iron-ajax>`).  It has been tested using unit tests.  It is part of the BYUtv Elements group of elements.
